title: Bronze 1 to Silver 5 (No promos)
body: So I was playing on a smurf (which is in Bronze 1) today and had won a couple games in a row but the thing is when I hit 88 LP and won the next game after though and was promoted straight into silver 5? I didn't even know that could happen and I was just wondering if this was a preseason thing or it was just because the MMR was high enough to just skip the series all together.

replies.body:
yup, that happened to me... Bronze 1 to Silver V when I had 72 lp,

Also when I finished my first 2 Silver V promo games (both wins) I was promoted to Silver 3
Damn you guys and here i am working hard on my B1 to S5 promos first game in with a win under my belt.
Yeah you skipped. My friend skipped from Silver IV to Silver II or so. That's how he ended up getting to Gold in like less than 2 weeks from Bronze I.

pretty sure riot came out at one time to say the highest you can skip is 2 divisions or something. 
ranked team went from silver 5 40 lp a win to silver 3 then silver 1
my challenger/master friend made a new account got placed in low gold or high silver i dont remember, his first promos was in plat, i think plat 3-1
ahhh that's what it is i played a ranked just then and went from B4 to B2 and was like ummm (havn't played ranked in a long time)
MMR was high enough to skip. Because I'm Master Tier I played in a Bronze 3 ranked team with 66LP, we won a single game and went straight to Bronze 1
